column4: I did some package upgrades and now my system won't get past an (initramfs) prompt at boot, I can't find anything on the forums about this, can someone help
How do I mount a hdd partition from the live cd?
well the livecd should automount it under /media but if not do a sudo fdisk -l to find it then sudo mkdir /media/hda1;sudo mount /dev/hda1 /media/hda1
